channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-8926] Projections that only swap input columns are identified incorrectly as identity projections
item.description:
Projection operators that only swap the input columns in the tuples are identified as identity projections, and thus incorrectly deleted from the plan by the identity project removal optimization.

This bug was introduced in HIVE-8435.
item.summary: Projections that only swap input columns are identified incorrectly as identity projections

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: To get Hive QA run on your patch, you need to attach it here and mark it "Patch Available"

ashutoshc, I added an additional check to know whether although the SelectOp keeps all the columns in the inputs, it swaps them; in this case, it should not be removed from the plan.

Let's see how the tests go.

Overall: -1 at least one tests failed

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12682697/HIVE-8926.patch

ERROR: -1 due to 41 failed/errored test(s), 6664 tests executed
